Class JdbcGenreRepository

java.lang.Object
cat.uvic.teknos.dam.kamika.repositories.jdbc.JdbcGenreRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenreRepository
public class JdbcGenreRepository extends Object implements GenreRepository
JDBC implementation of the Genre repository. Follows best practices for connection handling and exception management.
